payload.description: Optional. The AppConnector event payload. Unset for deletion events.

AppConnectorEventData.title: App Connector Event Data
AppConnectorEventData.description: The data within all AppConnector events.

name.description: Required. Unique resource name of the AppConnector. The name is ignored when creating a AppConnector.

createTime.description: Output only. Timestamp when the resource was created.

updateTime.description: Output only. Timestamp when the resource was last modified.

labels.description: Optional. Resource labels to represent user provided metadata.

displayName.description: Optional. An arbitrary user-provided name for the AppConnector. Cannot exceed 64 characters.

uid.description: Output only. A unique identifier for the instance generated by the system.

state.title: State
state.description: Represents the different states of a AppConnector.

principalInfo.description: Required. Principal information about the Identity of the AppConnector.

resourceInfo.description: Optional. Resource info of the connector.

AppConnector.title: App Connector
AppConnector.description: A BeyondCorp connector resource that represents an application facing component deployed proximal to and with direct access to the application instances. It is used to establish connectivity between the remote enterprise environment and GCP. It initiates connections to the applications and can proxy the data from users over the connection.

email.description: Email address of the service account.

ServiceAccount.title: Service Account
ServiceAccount.description: ServiceAccount represents a GCP service account.

id.description: Required. Unique Id for the resource.

time.description: The timestamp to collect the info. It is suggested to be set by the topmost level resource only.

sub.description: List of Info for the sub level resources.

ResourceInfo.title: Resource Info
ResourceInfo.description: ResourceInfo represents the information/status of an app connector resource. Such as: - remote_agent   - container     - runtime     - appgateway       - appconnector         - appconnection           - tunnel       - logagent
